full_text: Once upon a time, in a dense forest, there lived a cunning fox and a wise tortoise. The fox would often boast about his speed and agility,

text.en: Once upon a time, in a dense forest, there lived a cunning fox and a wise tortoise.
text.id: Pada suatu waktu, di sebuah hutan yang lebat, hiduplah seekor rubah licik dan seekor kura-kura bijak.

text.en: The fox would often boast about his speed and agility,
text.id: Rubah itu sering membual tentang kecepatan dan kelincahannya,
